events.message: We have received John Doe's application for the Software Engineer position. The resume highlights strong experience in backend development with Python and AWS.
John's application has been categorized under Engineering as he is applying for the Software Engineer role, which matches his developer background.
The recruiter Sarah has been assigned to John's application to coordinate further steps including initial screening and scheduling interviews.
Sarah completed the initial phone screening with John and confirmed his enthusiasm and relevant experience in software development and cloud infrastructure.
John responded promptly to the interview invitation and expressed eagerness to participate in the technical interview scheduled for next week.
The technical interview with John has been scheduled for 2024-05-09T10:00:00Z focusing on system design and coding challenges.
